thread.title: Walkie wearables - the fitness tracker for dogs

title: Walkie wearables - the fitness tracker for dogs
text:
Walkie wearables - the fitness tracker for dogs 11:50am IST - 01:41 
The latest wearable devices have been showcased at Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, as designers attempt to breath new life into a flagging market. As Ivor Bennett reports, one Finnish company is hoping pets will be a hungrier market than humans. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The latest wearable devices have been showcased at Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, as designers attempt to breath new life into a flagging market. As Ivor Bennett reports, one Finnish company is hoping pets will be a hungrier market than humans.
